name: The Different Emoji
description:
Can you find the different emoji in the puzzle?

Game features

⭐️ An easy and fun way to play 😁
⭐️ Various puzzles that gets harder with time 😲
⭐️ Contains emojis that you like 😉
⭐️ Simple and attractive graphics 😍
⭐️ Supported languages: Arabic, English, French, and Spanish 😎
⭐️ The game is free 😱

The game is under continuous development, so we welcome all your constructive suggestions and your inquiries. We hope that you like the game. 👌
